extension.name: VMCustom - multiattribs
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: This custom field plugin allows to add multiple drop down fields with custom price per each currency used without using any child products.This plugin requires a specific VM configuration (pricesbyCurrency=1) in your virtuemart.cfg file which allows you to have custom price per your curriences without using the convertor ECB module. Further noconvert.php is recommended.
